name.en: Chemistry and Application of Conjugated Polymer
name.ch: 共軛高分子化學與應用

remark.ch: 若無外籍生修課，改為中文授課

goal.en: The main content of this course focuses on the structure, synthesis, property and the application (for example, sensors, field-effect transistors, light-emitting diode, solar cells and so on) of conjugated polymers. Hope this course can be helpful to students to learn fundamental knowledge and in particular the application of conjugate polymers.
goal.ch: 此課程主要針對特定之共軛高分子之結構、合成、性質及其相關應用(如感測器、場效電晶體、發光二極體與有機高分子太陽能電池等)進行介紹，希望可透過此課程使學生對於共軛高分子相關之基礎知識與廣泛地應用性有更深的認識和了解，並啟發其未來從事相關學術研究或產業發展的興趣與想法。

content.en:
[1] Fundamentals of conjugated polymers
[2] Polyacetylenes
[3] Poly(phenylenevinylene)s
[4] Poly(aryleneethynylene)s
[5] Polythiophenes
[6] Poly(2,7-carbazole)s
[7] Polyfluorenes
[8] Application of conjugated polymers in electronics:
(a) Sensors (bio, chemical and optical)
(b) Memory devices
(c) Battery and super-capacitor
(d) Corrosion protection
(e) Electro- or photo-chromic devices
(f) Field-effect transistor
(g) Light-emitting diode
(h) Photovoltaic devices“
